DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a daily supplement of vitamin D, taking before and during pregnancy, effects child birth weight, pre- and postpartum complication and bone mineral density during lactation.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Vitamin D Supplement Before and During Pregnancy on Birth Weight
DOC.criteria: POH25vitamin D < 50 nmol/l Woman age 3035 years In good general health Infertility Intake of 400 IU or more Vitamin D/day Cancer Alcohol or drug abuse Calciummetabolic disturbances Spontaneous abortion within last 6 month
